Synopsis: Uploads a file to a specified URL using the OpenAI API.
Description: The Invoke-OAIUploadFile function uploads a file to a specified URL using the OpenAI API. It supports uploading files for fine-tuning or for use with assistants.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Invoke-OAIUploadFile -Path 'C:\Files\my_file.txt' -Purpose 'fine-tune'
Uploads the file 'my_file.txt' for fine-tuning using the OpenAI API.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ChildItem 'C:\Files' | Invoke-OAIUploadFile -Purpose 'assistants'
Uploads all files in the 'C:\Files' directory for use with assistants using the OpenAI API.
